title: First watchOS 8.7 and tvOS 15.6 betas join HomePod pre-release software
content:
With just a few weeks to go until WWDC 2022, Apple has just released iOS 15.6 beta 1 to developers. In addition, the company has also made available the first betas of tvOS 15.6, watchOS 8.7, and HomePod Software 15.6.

moreâ€¦

The post First watchOS 8.7 and tvOS 15.6 betas join HomePod pre-release software appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Apple has made available the first betas of tvOS 15.6, watchOS 8.7, and HomePod Software 15.6 to developers.
